projects.title: Therapeutic Guidelines (Main website - Legacy)
projects.description: Therapeutic Guidelines is an Australian health-related organization and this is the project I was involved with them. The website served as the organization's forum for health professionals both in Australia and worldwide. This was developed using Power Platform (Power Pages), ReactJS, CSS / SCSS, and Bootstrap.

projects.title: B2B Vendor Portal
projects.description: Vendor Portal is a B2B system built on Microsoft Power Pages, designed to streamline the management of purchase quotes, orders, and invoicing. It allows clients to track and file purchase quotes and orders, and receive real-time notifications when a payable invoice becomes available. The system also includes a vendor approval workflow, ensuring that purchase orders can only be issued to approved suppliers, enhancing control and compliance throughout the procurement process.

projects.title: Appointment Scheduling
projects.description: The client for this project is a well-known aesthetic clinic in the Philippines. The goal of both the company and the client is to streamline the reservation process for the clinic's customers. This system enables users to book appointments by selecting their preferred procedures and assigning the appropriate personnel for each service.
